item.title: Goat Simulator 3 gets a big new free update with Gifts from the Rifts and a plushie goat
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/04/01/goat-simulator-3-gets-a-big-new-free-update-with-gifts-from-the-rifts-and-a-plushie-goat/

Marking the tenth anniversary of Goat Simulator’s bizarre goat-laden shenanigans, Coffee Stain North has released a brand new update for Goat Simulator 3, the latest game in the series. This free update is now live, and entitled Gifts from the Rifts.

There’s 27 new gear items added in Gifts from the Rifts for Goat Simulator 3, while there’s two new in-game events to bring April Fools silliness to the game world of San Angora.

There’s also a new alternate goat model: Plushie Pilgor, to tie in with a new merch collab with YouTooz. This soft toy goat has a new ability that will turn anything in its path into a plaything as well. That’s quite a feat for Coffee Stain North to have accomplished for this game!

Gifts from the Rifts is available now for Goat Simulator 3 across PS5, Xbox Series X|S, PS4, Xbox One, PC, iOS and Android. It’s coming soon for the game on Nintendo Switch.

Aside from this, the Goat Direct stream was filled with other Goatee stuff. There’s a Goat Simulator: The Card Game Kickstarter launching on 30th April, there’s Goat Simulator themed controllers from CRKD, Goat Simulator 3 is hitting Twitch Rivals tonight, a crop top wearing Goat is available in Fortnite, and there’s the aforementioned YouTooz collectible Pilgor plushie.

And then there’s just one more thing…

item.title: Coffee Stain tease the next Goat Simulator 3 paid expansion
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/04/01/coffee-stain-tease-the-next-goat-simulator-3-paid-expansion/

Rounding off the Goat Direct stream was a teaser for the next paid DLC expansion for Goat Simulator 3. Wherever will Pilgor be going next?

Having launched back in 2022, Pilgor’s adventures in Goat Simulator 3 continued with the 2024 expansion, Multiverse of Nonsense, with its distinctly out-of-this-world tone. But what’s next? Well, it looks quite a lot like a vast and blank desert from the teaser trailer above, but is that then a tiger or lion growling at our tongue-dropping goat? Oh dear.

Well, it’s just a teaser, and I’ve absolutely no doubt that Coffee Stain will have a bigger reveal as we inch closer to its release. But in the meantime, there’s plenty with which to celebrate the tenth anniversary of what started as a dumb meme game.

For Goat Simulator 3 specifically, there’s a free new update, Gifts from the Rifts, while iOS and Android players can finally buy and play Multiverse of Nonsense. There’s also a Goat Simulator: The Card Game Kickstarter launching on 30th April, a Goat Simulator themed controllers from CRKD, Goat Simulator 3 is hitting Twitch Rivals tonight, a crop top wearing Goat is available in Fortnite, and there’s a YouTooz collectible Pilgor plushie, which is rather cute.
